blogPost.title: The U.S. men's basketball team suffered a 83-76 defeat to France in their opening game at the Tokyo Olympics https://t.co/GL1ctBadcH
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: 東京オリンピックの開幕戦でフランスに83-76で敗れた米国男子バスケットボールチーム https://t.co/GL1ctBadcH
美国男子篮球队在东京奥运会的揭幕战中以83-76不敌法国队，https://t.co/GL1ctBadcH。
美國男子籃球隊在東京奧運會的揭幕戰中以83-76不敵法國隊，https://t.co/GL1ctBadcH。

previous.title: The road to a third-straight Olympic gold medal for the Simone Biles-led U.S. women’s gymnastics team will not be the coronation everyone has been expecting https://t.co/7LOnG7MRGT
